attributes.review: First off, this app has a fugly Cheeto featured many times, and the sight of that alone is repulsive. This app is EXTREMELY racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, and much much more. This app is a disgrace to our country and I am embarrassed to have this app in the App Store. ❤️
attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP😡😡😡

attributes.review: I was having high hopes for this app but when i opened it i saw a bunch of pictures of pedos which were unbearably orange for no absolute reason😣 im very disappointed and i want this app GONE
attributes.title: Disgusting Pedos😣

attributes.review: Such a bad app. Always makes me gag whenever I see it! This app should not exist. It has no purpose and I could never understand why there is an app made for supporting a Cheeto.
It’s bad enough we have a homophobic, racist, sexist child sex offender as a president but now there’s an app made by him?! Just step down before you embarrass yourself more 🤮🤢😡
attributes.title: How isn’t he impeached already

attributes.review:
The layout of this app is very confusing!!! I downloaded it to see if it could be useful to
me turns out a racist, misogynistic, disgusting president was headlining it. in conclusion i had to delete the app❤️✨
Doesn’t work. Never did. Can’t believe this is even still available considering how horrifyingly broken this is.
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever seen

attributes.review: Trump is such a sexist, racist, homophobic, xenophobic, transphobic and idiotic piece of shït, and if he gets re elected I’m gonna cry. This man needs to be kicked out of the White House ASAP, and he deserves to go to jail ☺️🥰🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.title: I want to unalive myself after seeing this app

attributes.review: THIS IS APP IS ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE WORSE THAN TIKTOK IT TOOK ALL MY INFORMATION AND SOLE IT TO CHONA AS SOON AS I DOWNLOADED IT THE CHINESE GOVERNMENT TEXTED ME ANE THREATENED TO USE MY PERSONAL INFO AGAINST ME WE SHOULD BAN THIS APP NOT TIKTOK IT STEALS MORE INFO THAN ANY OTHER APP! also it kept showing these terrifyingly ugly photos of this orange man baby which has scarred me for life. we need to get rid of this app IMMEDIATELY!!!!!!
attributes.title: STOLE MY INFORMATION

attributes.review: Wouldn’t stop glitching. I have a brand new phone and i downloaded this app hoping to see some yummy trump content but it GLITCHED OUT and crashed every time i opened the app. bye i’m voting for biden 👋
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I saw a old man that looked like my pet Caterpillar, oh wait... that’s a Cheeto. A orange Cheeto with yellow hair? Am I drunk or... oh nvm I’m 12 I never had a sip of alcohol. It makes me sick. At the same time this app makes me sick cause of the pictures.
attributes.title: Very funny 👁👄👁✋
